mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT year FROM budget_monthly ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT csp, year, month, budget, currency FROM budget_monthly WHERE year = #{year} ORDER BY csp, month
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget_monthly (csp, year, month, budget, currency) VALUES (#{csp}, #{year}, #{month}, #{budget}, #{currency}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE budget = VALUES(budget), currency = VALUES(currency), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
